mapper.select: select bno,subjectName, personnel, recruiting, realStartDate, realEndDate from tbl_mentorBoard where userId = #{userId} and recruiting = '진행중' or userId = #{userId} and recruiting = '종료됨' order by recruiting desc,realStartDate desc;

select * from tbl_applicationMentor where menteeId = #{menteeId} and accept ='대기중' or menteeId = #{menteeId} and accept ='수락됨' or menteeId = #{menteeId} and accept ='거절됨' order by field(accept, '대기중','수락됨','거절됨'), regDate desc;
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_applicationMentor where bno = #{bno} and menteeId = #{menteeId}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_applicationMentor where bno = #{bno} and menteeId = #{menteeId}
